org.magiclib.bounty

Class MagicBountySpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magiclib.bounty.MagicBountySpec

  • public class MagicBountySpec
extends java.lang.Object
    The code representation of a bounty json definition.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String existing_target_memkey
      existing fleet if non empty, the bounty will be placed on the existing fleet with that memkey.
      com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.FleetAssignment fleet_behavior
      PASSIVE, GUARDED, AGGRESSIVE, ROAMING, default to GUARDED (campaign.FleetAssignment.orbit_aggressive)
      java.lang.String fleet_composition_faction
      Faction of the extra ship, can be different from the bounty faction (in case of pirate deserters for example)
      float fleet_composition_quality
      default to 2 (no Dmods) if <0
      java.lang.String fleet_faction
      faction of the fleet once it is generated, but not necessarily the faction of the ships inside
      boolean fleet_flagship_alwaysRecoverable 
      boolean fleet_flagship_autofit
      if false the weapons won't get changed, but no D-mod will be added at low quality either
      java.lang.String fleet_flagship_name 
      java.lang.String fleet_flagship_variant 
      int fleet_min_FP 
      java.lang.String fleet_musicSetId
      The musicSetId to use for the fleet, default to the faction's default music set.
      java.lang.String fleet_name
      bounty fleet
      boolean fleet_no_retreat
      default to false, prevents the enemy from retreating
      boolean fleet_preset_autofit
      if false the weapons won't get changed, but no D-mod will be added at low quality either
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> fleet_preset_ships
      optional preset fleet generated with the flagship, [variantId:number_of_ships]
      float fleet_scaling_multiplier
      dynamic reinforcements to match that amount of player fleet DP, set to 0 to ignore
      boolean fleet_transponder 
      java.lang.String job_comm_reply
      Reply of the enemy to your hail, default to "The other $shipOrFleet does not answer to you hails."
      java.lang.String job_conclusion_script
      optional, can be used to give additional rewards or add further consequences in case of failure using memkeys to check the outcome
      int job_credit_reward 
      float job_credit_scaling
      only used with fleet scaling: total reward = job_credits_reward * (job_reward_scaling * (bounty fleet DP / fleet_minimal_DP) )
      int job_deadline 
      java.lang.String job_description
      full text of the bounty offer, the description will handle some text variables such as "$he_or_she".
      @Nullable java.lang.String job_difficultyDescription
      "none": no description, "auto": bounty board describes how dangerous the bounty is, any other text: bounty board displays the text
      java.lang.String job_forFaction
      successfully completing this mission with give a small reputation reward with this faction
      java.lang.String job_intel_expired
      short text added to the Intel object after the job has been left to expire
      java.lang.String job_intel_failure
      short text added to the Intel object after the job has been failed
      java.lang.String job_intel_success
      short text added to the Intel object after the job has been successfully completed
      @NotNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> job_item_reward 
      java.lang.String job_memKey
      optional, MemKey set to false is added when accepting the job, set to true if the job is sucessful
      java.lang.String job_name
      job name in the dialog pick list
      java.lang.String job_pick_option
      dialog text to pick the job
      java.lang.String job_pick_script
      optional, can be used to trigger further scripts when the mission is taken, for example you may want to have competing bounty hunters
      float job_reputation_reward 
      boolean job_show_arrow 
      boolean job_show_captain 
      MagicBountyLoader.ShowDistance job_show_distance
      how precisely the distance to the target is shown on the bounty board.
      MagicBountyLoader.ShowFleet job_show_fleet
      how much of the fleet to show on the bounty board.
      boolean job_show_type
      assassination: requires only to disable the flagship destruction: requires the complete destruction of the flagship without recovery obliteration: requires the complete destruction or disabling of the enemy fleet neutralisation: requires the destruction or disabling of 2/3rd of the enemy fleet default to assassination
      MagicBountyLoader.JobType job_type
      assassination, destruction, obliteration, neutralisation
      boolean location_defaultToAnyEntity
      if true and no suitable entity is found in systems with required themes and distance, a random entity will be picked instead.
      java.lang.String location_distance
      prefered distance, "CORE", "CLOSE" or "FAR".
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_entities
      PLANET, GATE, STATION, STABLE_LOCATION, DEBRIS, WRECK, PROBE.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_marketFactions
      takes precedence over all other parameters but market ids
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_marketIDs
      preset location, can default to the other preferences if those are defined and the location doesn't exists due to Nexerelin random mode
      boolean location_prioritizeUnexplored
      will pick in priority systems that have not been visited by the player yet, but won't override the distance requirements
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_themes
      campaign.ids.Tags + "procgen_no_theme" + "procgen_no_theme_pulsar_blackhole"
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_themes_blacklist 
      java.lang.String target_aiCoreId
      if properly set, turn the target into a AI, makes it drop AI cores
      int target_elite_skills
      Overrides the regular number of elite skills, set to -1 to ignore.
      java.lang.String target_first_name
      Enemy captain's first name.
      com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.FullName.Gender target_gender
      MALE, FEMALE, ANY
      java.lang.String target_last_name
      Enemy captain's last name.
      int target_level

      personality from campaign.ids.Personalities

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> target_skills
      OVERRIDES ALL RANDOM SKILLS!
      @NotNull java.lang.Float trigger_giverTargetRelationship_atLeast
      minimal relationship between the bounty giver and the target
      @NotNull java.lang.Float trigger_giverTargetRelationship_atMost
      maximum relationship between the bounty giver and the target
      @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> trigger_market_id
      will default to the other preferences if those are defined and the location doesn't exists due to Nexerelin random mode
      int trigger_market_minSize 
      boolean trigger_marketFaction_alliedWith
      visited market is at least neutral with one those factions
      @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> trigger_marketFaction_any

      visited market is at best inhospitable with all those factions

      maximum player relationship with those factions
      float trigger_weight_mult
      simple frequency multiplier

      • job_type

        public MagicBountyLoader.JobType job_type
        assassination, destruction, obliteration, neutralisation

      • job_show_type

        public boolean job_show_type
        assassination: requires only to disable the flagship destruction: requires the complete destruction of the flagship without recovery obliteration: requires the complete destruction or disabling of the enemy fleet neutralisation: requires the destruction or disabling of 2/3rd of the enemy fleet default to assassination

      • job_show_captain

        public boolean job_show_captain

      • job_show_fleet

        public MagicBountyLoader.ShowFleet job_show_fleet
        how much of the fleet to show on the bounty board. none: default text: "the target has a massive fleet comprised of around 15 ships." flagship: only shows an image of the flagship flagshipText: shows an image of the flagships and a text with the number of other ships preset: only show an image of the Flagship and the preset fleet presetText: show an image of the Flagship and the preset fleet, plus a text with the number of other ships vanilla: shows the Flagship and the 9 biggest ships of the fleet, plus a text with the number of other ships all: show an image of all the ships in the fleet.

      • job_show_distance

        public MagicBountyLoader.ShowDistance job_show_distance
        how precisely the distance to the target is shown on the bounty board. none: default vague: "The target is located somewhere in the vicinity of the core worlds." distance: "It is located roughly %s LY away from your current position." system: "The target is located in the system." vanilla: "The target is located near a giant in a system with a yellow primary star, in the Nebulon constellation." vanillaDistance: "The target is located near a giant in a system with a yellow primary star, in the Nebulon constellation. It is located roughly %s LY away from your current position."

      • job_show_arrow

        public boolean job_show_arrow

      • job_pick_option

        public java.lang.String job_pick_option
        dialog text to pick the job

      • job_pick_script

        public java.lang.String job_pick_script
        optional, can be used to trigger further scripts when the mission is taken, for example you may want to have competing bounty hunters

      • job_memKey

        public java.lang.String job_memKey
        optional, MemKey set to false is added when accepting the job, set to true if the job is sucessful

      • job_conclusion_script

        public java.lang.String job_conclusion_script
        optional, can be used to give additional rewards or add further consequences in case of failure using memkeys to check the outcome

        public java.lang.String existing_target_memkey
        existing fleet if non empty, the bounty will be placed on the existing fleet with that memkey. OVERRIDES EVERYTHING AFTER!

        public boolean fleet_preset_autofit
        if false the weapons won't get changed, but no D-mod will be added at low quality either

        public float fleet_scaling_multiplier
        dynamic reinforcements to match that amount of player fleet DP, set to 0 to ignore

      • fleet_min_FP

        public int fleet_min_FP

      • fleet_composition_faction

        public java.lang.String fleet_composition_faction
        Faction of the extra ship, can be different from the bounty faction (in case of pirate deserters for example)

      • fleet_composition_quality

        public float fleet_composition_quality
        default to 2 (no Dmods) if <0

      • fleet_transponder

        public boolean fleet_transponder

      • fleet_no_retreat

        public boolean fleet_no_retreat
        default to false, prevents the enemy from retreating

      • fleet_behavior

        public com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.FleetAssignment fleet_behavior
        PASSIVE, GUARDED, AGGRESSIVE, ROAMING, default to GUARDED (campaign.FleetAssignment.orbit_aggressive)

      • fleet_musicSetId

        public java.lang.String fleet_musicSetId
        The musicSetId to use for the fleet, default to the faction's default music set. IMPORTANT: This must be added to the mod's `sounds.json` file. See "music_soe_fight" in the vanilla `sounds.json` for an example.

      • location_marketIDs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_marketIDs
        preset location, can default to the other preferences if those are defined and the location doesn't exists due to Nexerelin random mode

      • location_marketFactions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_marketFactions
        takes precedence over all other parameters but market ids

      • location_distance

        public java.lang.String location_distance
        prefered distance, "CORE", "CLOSE" or "FAR". Can be left empty to ignore.

      • location_themes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_themes
        campaign.ids.Tags + "procgen_no_theme" + "procgen_no_theme_pulsar_blackhole"

      • location_themes_blacklist

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_themes_blacklist

      • location_entities

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> location_entities
        PLANET, GATE, STATION, STABLE_LOCATION, DEBRIS, WRECK, PROBE.

      • location_prioritizeUnexplored

        public boolean location_prioritizeUnexplored
        will pick in priority systems that have not been visited by the player yet, but won't override the distance requirements

      • location_defaultToAnyEntity

        public boolean location_defaultToAnyEntity
        if true and no suitable entity is found in systems with required themes and distance, a random entity will be picked instead. if false, the script will ignore the distance requirement to attempt to find a suitable system
